segments.text: Jim , what do you think of that first interviewee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , he looked sharp and he came across as a very confident guy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , what about the first woman ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She looked a little rough around the edges but had great skills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , and what about the older gentle ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He was very distinguished , maybe a bit over-qualified .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ohhhh . I hate this part of my job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you go over the resumes again ? They might help you decide who to hire .
segments.speaker: S2
